events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it because the item does not meet my expectations. I would like to know the process for getting a refund.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for a return and refund of the product purchased.
Assigning the case to the refund specialist team to assist with the customer's request efficiently and process the return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to return your order and get a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can start processing your refund request?
Sure, my order number is 458392, and I’m returning the product because it was not as described on your website.

Thank you for the information. You can return the product using the prepaid shipping label we will send you shortly. After we receive and inspect the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the package back as soon as I get the label.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please let us know once you ship the product, and we will keep you updated until your refund is complete.
Just following up to confirm that we received your returned item and your refund has been issued. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been successfully processed. Thank you for your patience and for choosing our service.
